workflow.name: Automate employee reimbursement workflow with Gmail, Google Drive & AI validation
workflow.description:
**Reimbursements used to be a headache.**

Employees submitted receipts through emails, managers got stuck in approval chains, and finance teams spent hours checking for duplicates, updating sheets, and sending follow-up emails.

**So, we automated it.**

Using n8n, we built a smart Employee Reimbursement Workflow that does everythingâ€¦ in just a few clicks.

**Hereâ€™s how it works.**]
When an employee uploads a receipt, the workflow first checks for duplicates.
If the file is new, itâ€™s uploaded to Google Drive instantly.
Next, a unique tracking ID is generatedâ€”no manual typing, no mistakes.
Then, all the details are logged in Google Sheets in real time, ready for records.
And finally, the Finance team gets an email notification with everything they need to process the paymentâ€”no chasing, no missing info.

**The impact?**
Weâ€™ve cut processing time by over 70%, reduced errors to nearly zero, and made the entire process stress-free for employees and finance alike.

This isnâ€™t just automationâ€”itâ€™s giving people their time back.


![Screenshot 20250805 152900.png](fileId:2049)

You will receive an email shortly about your reimbursement request from Finance Department.

parameters.message:
=Dear {{ $json.receiptContent.empName }},

It was identified that the claims requested does not match the total bill from the uploaded receipts . 

Amount Claimed: $ {{ $json.receiptContent.amountClaimed }}/-
Total Bill: $ {{ $json.receiptContent.totalBill }}/-
Uploaded Recipt: {{ $json.receiptContent.uploadedFile }}
Bill Type: {{ $json.receiptContent.billType }}

Please review and resubmit the request.

*Claims are Subject to Approvals*

Regards,
Finance Depeartment
parameters.subject: =New Reimbursement Request - INR {{ $('On form submission').item.json['Claim Amount'] }} /-

parameters.message:
=Dear {{ $json['Employee Name'] }},

Thank you for your email. 

Request ID: {{ $json.RequestID }}

You reimbursement rquest as below is being reviewed.

Amount Claimed: ${{ $('Validate False Claims').item.json.receiptContent.amountClaimed }}/-
Total Bill: ${{ $json['Total Billed Amount'] }}/-
Uploaded Recipt: {{ $json['Recieipt Link'] }}
Bill Type: {{ $json['Receipt Type'] }}

*Claims are subject to approvals*

Regards,
Finance Depeartment
parameters.subject: =New Reimbursement Request - INR {{ $('On form submission').item.json['Claim Amount'] }} /- | {{ $json.RequestID }}

parameters.text:
=Create a JSON as below and just return structed JSON in strings. 

{
  empID: {{ $('On form submission').item.json['Emp ID'] }},
  empName: {{ $('On form submission').item.json['Emp Name'] }},
  empEmail: {{ $('On form submission').item.json.Email }},
  billType: {{ $('On form submission').item.json['Nature of Bill'] }},
  amountClaimed: {{ $('On form submission').item.json['Claim Amount'] || 0.00}},
  totalBill: Extract the total amount from the binary,
  uploadedFile: {{ $json.webViewLink }}

## NOTE
 - Do not append ```json\n in the output

parameters.content:
## Submit Form
This form will get all required information from the user and pass it to other nodes

## Validate User Uploaded Bills.

Validate if the user uploaded bill already exists into the system.

If **Yes** then reuse and download for proccesing.
**Else** -- Upload the bill and then use for processing.

## Uploads and Downloads
If **Bills Already Exist]** Download the file and send to next node for OCR.



























If **Bills Does not Exists**
- **Merge** - This node will get the user uploaded file [**binary**] and then uploads to **GDrive** from the next node. 
- The Same file get downloaded again and then passed to next node for OCR

## Extract, Validate
These nodes will 
- Extract the content from the bill
- Validate if the claim made by the user is correct. Whether the amount claimed and the amount from the bill match.
- If **false claim** the Notify user to resubmit.
- If **correct claim** send for Finance Team for processing.

## Valid Claim
- Notify User with the request id.
- Notify Finance Team to proceed with review.

user.name: Pramod Rathoure
user.bio: I design and build custom n8n workflows that cut out repetitive work, connect your favorite tools, and keep things running smoothlyâ€”think less busywork, smarter integrations, and faster, error-free results. My goal is to free up your time so you and your team can focus on what really matters. Letâ€™s chatâ€”Iâ€™d love to help you turn messy processes into smooth, automated workflows.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
